elements.text:
The cos() function returns the cosine of a given
angle. Angles in picotron are messured as a
range of 0.0-1.0 counter-clockwize around a unit
circle, 0.0 being to the right.

A way to think about it ->
  cos() returns the 'x' component of an angle
  on a unit circle.
SIDENOTE: unlike sin(), cos() is not inverted.
